text: @TheLeadCNN @jennyrachelpal @drsanjaygupta As Dr. Birk said in the White House briefing, if you go to the hospital & you have a coronavirus, whether you die from coronavirus or not, it will be labeled a coronavirus death. ie. You die of a collapsed lung from a car accident, but have coronavirus. It's labeled as COVID19.
